bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Etiological Agent. identical with yu 鬱①, pent-up [qi]. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry tu fu ling 土茯苓 quotes Ben cao hui bian 本草會編 : 土屬濕，主肌肉，濕熱鬱蓄於肌腠，故發為癰腫 , “Soil is associated with moisture; it rules muscles and flesh. Now if there is pent-up moisture and heat [qi] accumulation in the muscles and interstices, this will result in obstruction-illness with swelling”.
